      • fixVaccineCasing

        public static java.lang.String fixVaccineCasing(java.lang.String display)
        This method return the vaccine name first character as capital for selected vaccines other's return as capital form like : input opv 1 output OPV 1,rota 1 as Rota 1,mena as MenA
        Parameters:
        "opv - 1","rota 1","mena"
        Returns:
        "OPV 1","Rota 1","MenA"
